form.label: Client Summary
form.description: This dashboard provides a summary of client activity and statistics in the Cisco Catalyst network.

search.query: sourcetype="cisco:catalyst:client" | stats values(cisco_catalyst_host) AS cisco_catalyst_host | mvexpand cisco_catalyst_host

sourcetype="cisco:catalyst:client" cisco_catalyst_host="$ciscocatalysthostDropdown$" | dedup ClientMACAddress keepevents=false | where "$siteFilter$"=="Global" OR lower(ClientSiteHierarchy) LIKE lower("%$siteFilter$%") | stats count as total_clients

sourcetype="cisco:catalyst:client" cisco_catalyst_host="$ciscocatalysthostDropdown$" | dedup ClientMACAddress ClientLastUpdatedTime keepevents=false | where "$siteFilter$"=="Global" OR lower(ClientSiteHierarchy) LIKE lower("%$siteFilter$%") | stats count as total_sessionss

sourcetype="cisco:catalyst:client" cisco_catalyst_host="$ciscocatalysthostDropdown$" | dedup ClientMACAddress keepevents=false | where "$siteFilter$"=="Global" OR lower(ClientSiteHierarchy) LIKE lower("%$siteFilter$%") | stats count by ClientOSType | rename ClientOSType as "OS Type" | eval "OS Type" = 'OS Type' . " (" . count . ")"

sourcetype="cisco:catalyst:client" cisco_catalyst_host="$ciscocatalysthostDropdown$" | dedup ClientMACAddress keepevents=false | where "$siteFilter$"=="Global" OR lower(ClientSiteHierarchy) LIKE lower("%$siteFilter$%") | stats count by ClientDeviceType | rename ClientDeviceType as "Device Type"

sourcetype="cisco:catalyst:client" cisco_catalyst_host="$ciscocatalysthostDropdown$" | dedup ClientMACAddress keepevents=false | where "$siteFilter$"=="Global" OR lower(ClientSiteHierarchy) LIKE lower("%$siteFilter$%") | stats count by ClientConnectionBand | rename ClientConnectionBand as "Band" | eval "Band" = 'Band' . " (" . count . ")"

sourcetype="cisco:catalyst:client" cisco_catalyst_host="$ciscocatalysthostDropdown$" | dedup ClientMACAddress keepevents=false | where "$siteFilter$"=="Global" OR lower(ClientSiteHierarchy) LIKE lower("%$siteFilter$%") | stats sum(ClientTrafficUsage) as usage by ClientConnectionBand | eventstats sum(usage) as TotalUsage | eval percentage = round((usage/TotalUsage)*100, 2) | eval ConnectionBand = ClientConnectionBand." (".percentage."%)" | table ConnectionBand, usage

sourcetype="cisco:catalyst:client" cisco_catalyst_host="$ciscocatalysthostDropdown$" | dedup ClientMACAddress keepevents=false | where "$siteFilter$"=="Global" OR lower(ClientSiteHierarchy) LIKE lower("%$siteFilter$%") | stats sum(ClientConnectionSessionDuration) as total_session_duration by ClientConnectionBand | eventstats sum(total_session_duration) as TotalSessionDuration | eval hours = round(total_session_duration / 3600, 2) | eval total_hours = round(TotalSessionDuration / 3600, 2) | eval ConnectionBand = ClientConnectionBand." (".hours." hrs)" | table ConnectionBand, hours, total_hours

sourcetype="cisco:catalyst:client" cisco_catalyst_host="$ciscocatalysthostDropdown$" | dedup ClientMACAddress keepevents=false | where "$siteFilter$"=="Global" OR lower(ClientSiteHierarchy) LIKE lower("%$siteFilter$%") | stats count by ClientConnectionProtocol | rename ClientConnectionProtocol as "Protocol" | eval "Protocol" = 'Protocol' . " (" . count . ")"

sourcetype="cisco:catalyst:client" cisco_catalyst_host="$ciscocatalysthostDropdown$" | dedup ClientMACAddress keepevents=false | where "$siteFilter$"=="Global" OR lower(ClientSiteHierarchy) LIKE lower("%$siteFilter$%") | stats sum(ClientTrafficUsage) as usage by ClientConnectionProtocol | eventstats sum(usage) as TotalUsage | eval percentage = round((usage/TotalUsage)*100, 2) | eval Protocol = ClientConnectionProtocol." (".percentage."%)" | table Protocol, usage

sourcetype="cisco:catalyst:client" cisco_catalyst_host="$ciscocatalysthostDropdown$" | dedup ClientMACAddress keepevents=false | where "$siteFilter$"=="Global" OR lower(ClientSiteHierarchy) LIKE lower("%$siteFilter$%") | stats sum(ClientConnectionSessionDuration) as total_session_duration by ClientConnectionProtocol | eventstats sum(total_session_duration) as TotalSessionDuration | eval hours = round(total_session_duration / 3600, 2) | eval total_hours = round(TotalSessionDuration / 3600, 2) | eval Protocol = ClientConnectionProtocol." (".hours." hrs)" | table Protocol, hours, total_hours

panel.title: Top 10 Clients by Received Transmission Usage

search.query: sourcetype="cisco:catalyst:client" cisco_catalyst_host="$ciscocatalysthostDropdown$" | dedup ClientUsername keepevents=false | table ClientUsername
sourcetype="cisco:catalyst:client" cisco_catalyst_host="$ciscocatalysthostDropdown$" | dedup ClientMACAddress keepevents=false | table ClientMACAddress
sourcetype="cisco:catalyst:client" cisco_catalyst_host="$ciscocatalysthostDropdown$" | dedup ClientIPv4Address keepevents=false | table ClientIPv4Address

table.title: Site: $siteFilter$

search.query: sourcetype="cisco:catalyst:client" cisco_catalyst_host="$ciscocatalysthostDropdown$" ClientIPv4Address="$clientIpAddressDropdown$" ClientUsername="$clientUsernameDropdown$" ClientMACAddress="$clientMACAddressDropdown$" ClientType="$clientTypeDropdown$" | stats latest(*) as * by ClientID | where "$siteFilter$"=="Global" OR lower(ClientSiteHierarchy) LIKE lower("%$siteFilter$%") | where ClientTrafficUsage > 0 | sort -ClientTrafficUsage | head 10 | eval ciscocatalysthostip=replace("$ciscocatalysthostDropdown$", "https://", "") | eval URL="https://"+ciscocatalysthostip+"/dna/assurance/client/details?macAddress="+ClientMACAddress | rename ClientID as "Client ID", ClientMACAddress as "MAC Address", ClientType as "Type", ClientTrafficRXBytes as "Bytes Received (RX)", ClientTrafficTXBytes as "Bytes Transmitted (TX)", ClientTrafficUsage as "Total Usage (Bytes)", ClientSiteHierarchy as "Site", ClientConnectionStatus as "Connection Status", ClientConnectionBand as "Connection Band", ClientConnectedNetworkDeviceType as "Connected Network Device Type", ClientIPv4Address as "IP Address", ClientName as "Host Name", ClientUsername as "Username" | table "Client ID", "Username", "Host Name", "IP Address", "MAC Address", "Type", "Bytes Received (RX)", "Bytes Transmitted (TX)", "Total Usage (Bytes)", "Site", "Connection Status", "Connection Band", "Connected Network Device Type", URL

table.fields: "Client ID", "Username", "Host Name", "MAC Address", "IP Address", "Type", "Bytes Received (RX)", "Bytes Transmitted (TX)", "Total Usage (Bytes)", "Site", "Connection Status", "Connection Band", "Connected Network Device Type"

panel.title: Top 10 Clients with Transmission Errors and Retries

search.query: sourcetype="cisco:catalyst:client" cisco_catalyst_host="$ciscocatalysthostDropdown$" | stats values(ClientUsername) AS ClientUsername | mvexpand ClientUsername | table ClientUsername
sourcetype="cisco:catalyst:client" cisco_catalyst_host="$ciscocatalysthostDropdown$" | stats values(ClientMACAddress) AS ClientMACAddress | mvexpand ClientMACAddress | table ClientMACAddress
sourcetype="cisco:catalyst:client" cisco_catalyst_host="$ciscocatalysthostDropdown$" | stats values(ClientIPv4Address) AS ClientIPv4Address | mvexpand ClientIPv4Address | table ClientIPv4Address

table.title: Site: $siteFilter$

search.query: sourcetype="cisco:catalyst:client" cisco_catalyst_host="$ciscocatalysthostDropdown$" ClientIPv4Address="$clientIpAddressDropdown2$" ClientUsername="$clientUsernameDropdown2$" ClientMACAddress="$clientMACAddressDropdown2$" | stats latest(*) as * by ClientID | where "$siteFilter$"=="Global" OR lower(ClientSiteHierarchy) LIKE lower("%$siteFilter$%") | eval total_errors = ClientTrafficRXLinkErrorPercentage + ClientTrafficTXLinkErrorPercentage + ClientTrafficRXRetries | where total_errors > 0 | sort -ClientTrafficRXLinkErrorPercentage | head 10 | eval ciscocatalysthostip=replace("$ciscocatalysthostDropdown$", "https://", "") | eval URL="https://"+ciscocatalysthostip+"/dna/assurance/client/details?macAddress="+ClientMACAddress | rename ClientID as "Client ID", ClientMACAddress as "MAC Address", ClientType as "Type", ClientTrafficRXLinkErrorPercentage as "% Errors Received (RX)", ClientTrafficTXLinkErrorPercentage as "% Errors Transmitted (TX)", ClientTrafficRXRetries as "Retries Received (RX)", ClientTrafficRXRetryPercentage as "% Retries (RX)", ClientTrafficTXDrops as "TX Packets Lost", ClientSiteHierarchy as "Site", ClientConnectionStatus as "Connection Status", ClientConnectionBand as "Connection Band", ClientConnectedNetworkDeviceType as "Connected Network Device Type", ClientIPv4Address as "IP Address", ClientName as "Host Name", ClientUsername as "Username" | table "Client ID", "Username", "Host Name", "IP Address", "MAC Address", "Type", "% Errors Received (RX)", "% Errors Transmitted (TX)", "Retries Received (RX)", "% Retries (RX)", "TX Packets Lost", "Site", "Connection Status", "Connection Band", "Connected Network Device Type", URL

table.fields: "Client ID", "Username", "Host Name", "MAC Address", "IP Address", "Type", "% Errors Received (RX)", "% Errors Transmitted (TX)", "Retries Received (RX)", "% Retries (RX)", "TX Packets Lost", "Site", "Connection Status", "Connection Band", "Connected Network Device Type"
